name: Knight Club: Deluxe
detailed_description:
Knight Club: Deluxe is a follow up to the wildly popular Knight Club. This store page is still a work in progress and will be updated over time as new information regarding the game is made public. Check back often!



Online Multiplayer
Crush your friends and enemies in various online modes such as ranked, and casual matches.

Customize Your Knight
Choose from hundreds of customization options to make your own unique character! Be a sword-swinging hero, a spear-wielding Swampling, or a fireball casting Elf!



Mix and Match Your Armaments
There are 8 main weapons, and 8 sub-weapons to choose from in Knight Club: Deluxe. Choose whatever combination you'd like to fit your preferred playstyle.

Upgraded in Every Way!
Compared to the original Knight Club, Knight Club: Deluxe has all new environment art, brand new attacks, weapons, music, sound effects, game modes, mechanics, and more!

short_description: Knight Club: Deluxe is an action platform-fighting game that brings traditional fighting game elements into an unlocked, free form movement playstyle. Equip your favorite armaments and do battle against your friends locally or online!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz Processor or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Graphics with at least 32mb of vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Processor or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Graphics with at least 32mb of vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
